title: Professional Summary
description: Professional with over a decade of experience in IT services, focused on support and project work. My work is focused on practices that promote IT security and governance, continuous improvement, processes, communication and operational productivity. With relevant certifications, I seek to help maintain business continuity, ensuring that IT adds strategic value. I have experience in several market segments, with roles in Field Services, Service Desk and network infrastructure monitoring (NOC). Support for Technical Leadership, Commercial, HR, Governance and Security teams when necessary, including VIP support.
